captions.text:
Place me in a sunny room
Wherever it is

Just don't forget to water me
only once a month
But don't water me too much
I might look cold and blunt
My spines make me look gloomy
But no worries
I'll have beautiful flower soon
When you are hurt
When you are crying with no reasons
Just remember me
I'll be a mild consolation to you
Your tears dropping onto my head
You might be hurt and sad
Until you can make a smile
I will hold you silently
We used to be together, back then
If we can't get together again

I'll just hold your tears
and stand along Spring
When you are hurt
When you are crying with no reasons
Just remember me
I'll be a mild consolation to you
We used to be together, back then
If we can't get together again

I'll just hold your tears
and stand along Spring
Your tears dropping onto my head
You might be hurt and sad
Until you can make a smile
I will hold you silently
I'll stand along Spring
I'll stand along Spring
I'll stand along Spring
